about_me.des: Enesy Team is a group of Civil Engineers, we passion on programming and want to share our skills with you! Joint us now!

projects.enesycad: One Plugin for All Engineers .NET tool for management AutoCAD native commands, extend AutoCAD commands by C#, AutoLisp language. It's very usefull for Engineers, it optimize your work performance. Let's try it! you'll love it!
projects.project2: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.project3: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.project4: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
